meanings.definition: A semi-solid dairy product made from fermented milk.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy having yoghurt for breakfast every morning.
meanings.sent2: She bought a tub of yoghurt from the store.
meanings.sent3: The yoghurt spilled on the table, creating a funny mess.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as creamy and comforting as a bowl of yoghurt.
meanings.sent5: The moon looked like a giant bowl of yoghurt hanging in the sky.

meanings.sent1: I like to yoghurt with fresh fruit for a healthy snack.
meanings.sent2: He decided to yoghurt before heading to bed.
meanings.sent3: She yoghurted the whole container in one sitting!
meanings.sent4: The team yoghurted up all their energy before the big game.
meanings.sent5: Yoghurting slowly can be a relaxing way to end the day.
